item.title: Windows CE/Windows Mobile BSP Engineer (Santa Clara CA 95051)
item.description:
Description:

Accelwork is currently looking for a Microsoft Windows CE kernel-level developer to expand our development team working on leading-edge platforms.

Candidates must be able to come up to speed on new technologies quickly. Good communication skills and the ability to work in small teams are essential. The selected engineer will be expected to work on a wide range of areas including: Bootloader, Device Drivers, and the BSP in general.

Required Skills:

 Must have a good understanding of Windows CE 5 and 6 architectures.
 Experience specifically with Windows Mobile at the BSP level.
 Kernel experience including BSP porting, Bootloaders and board bring-up on WinCE 5 or 6.
 Good knowledge of ARM SoC and common peripherals
 Excellent system level debugging skills

Desirable skills:

 Experience with RIL drivers is a huge plus.
 Experience with ARM assembly language.

Additional requirements:

 U.S. Citizenship or Green card holders
 BSCS/BSCE/BSEE or equivalent work experience.
 At least 3-5 years experience in commercial software development
 Must be willing and able to provide exceptional customer service, including direct interfacing with clients
 Strong teamwork and communication skills
 Must enjoy a dynamic work environment
 Ability to learn fast and work independently
 Good multitasking and priority management skills

Job Location:

Santa Clara, CA, US. Occasional local travel and must be able to travel outside the US.

If you believe you can meet these exciting challenges, please email your resume to
